author: Graham Greene
text: ?We'd forgive most things if we knew the facts.?

author: Peter Cameron
text: ?I wish the whole day were like breakfast, when people are still connected to their dreams, focused inward, and not yet ready to engage with the world around them. I realized this is how I am all day; for me, unlike other people, there doesn't come a moment after a cup of coffee or a shower or whatever when I suddenly feel alive and awake and connected to the world. If it were always breakfast, I would be fine.?

author: Henry Ford
text: If there is any one secret of success, it lies in the ability to get the other persons point of view and see things from his angle as well as your own.
